--- Switchblade ---

Switchblade yelps, "Ack!" as he leaps over Motormaster smacking 
a de-activated demo charge to M's back, though M wouldn't know 
that it wasn't armed. He leaps back as he lands, away from 
Motormaster. "Extermination eh? Not something I'd like to have 
happen here... I'll leave convincing them up to you." Switchblade 
lounges in a chair a distance from Motormaster.


On 2 Jun 2001, at 2:37, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> Motormaster swatted towards Switchblade. "Those robots you saw on the
> screen, are the ones that sent Astroblast, Me, and the Stunticons to
> this planet. But they sent us for a seek and destroy mission. If they
> figured out that we're mucking with time, and recreating the
> Decepticons, they would send an extermination squad to finish us off,
> and we dont have the forces to stop them."
